column1: '''''Mythlore'' 60''' is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, featuring cover illustration by [[Nancy-Lou Patterson]].

The article 'Among the Trees: Seeking the Spirit of Narqelion' by [[Paul Nolan Hyde]] includes the text of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s poem '[[Narqelion]]' and an English translation, along with several early Tolkien poems. A summary of the article by [[Jorge Quiñónez]], including the text of the poem and an English translation, was published in ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'' [[Vinyar Tengwar 12
column2: Issue 12]], July 1990.<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'' at Tolkienbooks.net</ref>
